group.label: General Configuration for OWL Product Carousels and Banner Sliders

field.label: Breakpoint 1
field.comment: Add breakpoint. Ex.: 320. Applied to resolutions higher than set value.
field.tooltip: Below, in each carousel, you are able to set, for example, the items number in the carousels for each breakpoint. For example, you can set to display 2 items on mobile screens, 3 items on tablets and 4 items on desktop.

field.label: Breakpoint 2
field.comment: Add breakpoint. Ex.: 768. Applied to resolutions higher than set value.

field.label: Breakpoint 3
field.comment: Add breakpoint. Ex.: 1024. Applied to resolutions higher than set value.

field.label: Breakpoint 4
field.comment: Add breakpoint. Ex.: 1280. Applied to resolutions higher than set value.

field.label: Display wishlist
field.comment: Display/Hide wishlist.

field.label: Display compare
field.comment: Display/Hide compare.

field.label: Enable New Product Carousel
field.comment: In order for carousel to be displayed, make sure you have products defined as "New" and the carousel is inserted in your page/block. Insert the carousel by following the documentation.
field.tooltip: New Products Carousel - will be populated with products defined as 'New' in your magento catalog.

field.label: Title
field.comment: Insert custom title to be displayed on the carousel. For no title leave field empty.

field.label: Show Price
field.comment: Show/Hide the product price for products in the carousel

field.label: Show Add To Cart
field.comment: Show/Hide ‘Add to cart’ button for products in the carousel.

field.label: Show Wishlist
field.comment: Show/Hide wishlist icon for products in the carousel.

field.label: Show Compare
field.comment: Show/Hide Compare icon for products in the carousel

field.label: Random Sort
field.comment: If enabled, the products in the carousel are displayed in random order on each refresh.

field.label: Max Items
field.comment: The total number of products to be loaded in the carousel.

field.label: Loop
field.comment: Inifnity loop. Duplicate last and first items to get loop illusion.

field.label: Margin
field.comment: Set right margin for each item in carousel. Example: for a margin of 30px enter 30 in the field.

field.label: LazyLoad
field.comment: Lazy Load delays loading of images. Images outside of viewport are not loaded until user scrolls to them.

field.label: Autoplay
field.comment: Autoplay the carousel.

field.label: AutoplayTimeout
field.comment: Autoplay interval timeout. Set time between changing products (in milliseconds, for Example: 4000, for 4 seconds))

field.label: AutoplayHoverPause
field.comment: Set the autoplay to pause on mouse hover.

field.label: Next/Prev Buttons
field.comment: If True, next/prev buttons are displayed.

field.label: Dots
field.comment: If True, dots are displayed under carousel.

field.label: Items
field.comment: The number of items you want to see on the screen. This value should be smaller than Max Items.

field.label: Center
field.comment: If True, carousel is centered on the screen. Works well even with an odd number of items.

field.label: StagePadding
field.comment: Padding left and right on stage (can see neighbours).

field.label: Next/Prev Buttons
field.comment: If True, next/prev buttons are displayed.

field.comment: If True, dots are displayed under carousel.

field.label: StagePadding
field.comment: Padding left and right on stage (can see neighbours).

field.comment: Padding left and right on stage (can see neighbours).

field.label: StagePadding
field.comment: Padding left and right on stage (can see neighbours).

field.label: Enable Best Sell Products Carousel
field.comment: In order for carousel to be displayed make sure the carousel is inserted in your page/block and there are a few orders placed. Insert the carousel by following the documentation.
field.tooltip: Best Sell Products Carousel - will be dynamically populated with best selling products based on your magento admin statistics (make sure magento statistics are activated and products are visible in catalog in order to show up.)

field.label: Title
field.comment: Insert custom title to be displayed on the carousel. For no title leave field empty.

field.label: Show Price
field.comment: Show/Hide the product price for products in the carousel

field.label: Show Add To Cart
field.comment: Show/Hide ‘Add to cart’ button for products in the carousel.

field.label: Show Wishlist
field.comment: Show/Hide wishlist icon for products in the carousel.

field.label: Show Compare
field.comment: Show/Hide Compare icon for products in the carousel

field.label: Random Sort
field.comment: If enabled, the products in the carousel are displayed in random order on each refresh.

field.label: Max Items
field.comment: The total number of products to be loaded in the carousel.

field.label: Loop
field.comment: Inifnity loop. Duplicate last and first items to get loop illusion.

field.label: Margin
field.comment: Set right margin for each item in carousel. Example: for a margin of 30px enter 30 in the field.

field.label: LazyLoad
field.comment: Lazy Load delays loading of images. Images outside of viewport are not loaded until user scrolls to them.

field.label: Autoplay
field.comment: Autoplay the carousel.

field.label: AutoplayTimeout
field.comment: Autoplay interval timeout. Set time between changing products (in milliseconds, for Example: 4000, for 4 seconds))

field.label: AutoplayHoverPause
field.comment: Set the autoplay to pause on mouse hover.

field.label: Next/Prev Buttons
field.comment: If True, next/prev buttons are displayed.

field.label: Dots
field.comment: If True, dots are displayed under carousel.

field.label: Items
field.comment: The number of items you want to see on the screen. This value should be smaller than Max Items.

field.label: Center
field.comment: If True, carousel is centered on the screen. Works well even with an odd number of items. Carousel Breakpoint options overwrites this option. Please check below Breakpoint Carousel Options.

field.label: StagePadding
field.comment: Padding left and right on stage (can see neighbours).

field.label: Enable Sale Products Carousel

field.tooltip: Sale Products Carousel - will be populated with products defined as Sale in your magento catalog.

field.label: Enable Recently Viewed Products Carousel
field.comment: In order for carousel to be displayed, users must be logged in and visited at least one product and the carousel is inserted in your page/block. Insert the carousel by following the documentation.
field.tooltip: Recently Viewed Products Carousel - will be dynamically populated with products that users visit in your store while they are logged in

field.label: Enable Related Products Carousel
field.comment: If Enabled, the products will be displayed on product page in a carousel instead of default product grid. Make sure you have defined Related Products in your catalog.
field.tooltip: Related Products Carousel - makes sense only on product page, will be populated with related products defined in magento catalog for each specific product.

field.label: Enable Up-Sells Products Carousel
field.comment: If Enabled, the products will be displayed on product page in a carousel instead of default product grid. Make sure you have defined Up-Sells Products in your catalog.
field.tooltip: Note: If no products are available to populate a carousel then the carousel will not be displayed in frontend
